articles.content: PHOENIX Joey Meneses, a 30-year-old minor-league journeyman, had never played a single major-league game in his career until last August, and Sunday night hes hearing a sellout crowd screaming his na… [+7223 chars]

articles.author: Mike Hembree
articles.title: Winners and losers at Phoenix Raceway - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: William Byron, boosted by a late-race pit-stop decision by crew chief Rudy Fugle, won Sunday's Cup Series race at Phoenix Raceway.
articles.content:
What Cup drivers had to say Sunday at Phoenix Raceway:
